properties.label: Gene biotype
properties.description: Biotypes of genes annotated in Ensembl

properties.label: Chromosome
properties.description: The chromosome where a gene is located

properties.label: # of exons
properties.description: The number of exons

properties.label: # of paralogs
properties.description: The number of paralogs calculated based on HomoloGene

properties.label: Evolutionary conservation
properties.description: Evolutionary conservation of genes

properties.label: High-level expression
properties.description: Highly expressed genes in organs from RefEx

properties.label: Low-level expression
properties.description: Low expressed genes in organs from RefEx

properties.label: Expressed in tissues
properties.description: Genes expressed in tissues from GTEx

properties.label: Transcription factors
properties.description: Genes with hypothetical upstream TFs in ChIP-Atlas

properties.label: Protein domains
properties.description: Protein domains from UniProt

properties.label: Cellular component
properties.description: Gene ontology cellular component annotation from UniProt

properties.label: Biological process
properties.description: Gene ontology biological process annotation from UniProt

properties.label: Molecular function
properties.description: Gene ontology molecular function annotation from UniProt

properties.label: Ligands
properties.description: Ligand bindings from UniProt

properties.label: Molecular mass
properties.description: Molecular mass from UniProt

properties.label: PTMs
properties.description: Post-translational modifications from UniProt

properties.label: # of transmembrane domains
properties.description: The number of transmembrane segments from UniProt

properties.label: # of phosphorylation sites
properties.description: The number of phosphorylation sites from UniProt

properties.label: # of glycosylation sites
properties.description: The number of glycosylation sites from UniProt

properties.label: Disease-related proteins
properties.description: Disease-related proteins from UniProt

properties.label: Isolation source
properties.description: Tissues from which the protein was isolated, from UniProt

properties.label: Evidence of existence
properties.description: Protein existence obtained from neXtProt

properties.label: Structure data existence
properties.description: Uniprot entries with links to PDB data entries

properties.label: # of alpha-helices
properties.description: The number of alpha-helices in a PDB entry

properties.label: # of beta-sheets
properties.description: The number of beta-sheets in a PDB entry

properties.label: # of peptides in a PDB entry
properties.description: The number of peptides in a PDB entry

properties.label: Other related molecules
properties.description: Nonpeptide molecules related protein structures in PDB

properties.label: Analysis methods
properties.description: Structure determination methods in PDB

properties.label: Crystallization temperature
properties.description: Temperature of the crystallization solution in PDB

properties.label: Crystallization pH
properties.description: pH value of the crystallization solution in PDB

properties.label: Proteins in pathway
properties.description: The number of proteins in each pathway from Reactome

properties.label: Compounds in pathway
properties.description: The number of chemical compounds in each pathway from Reactome

properties.label: # of interacting proteins
properties.description: The number of interacting proteins from UniProt

properties.label: ChEMBL assay existence
properties.description: Proteins with or without ChEMBL assay from Uniprot

properties.label: Action type
properties.description: Mechanism action types in ChEMBL

properties.label: Substance type
properties.description: Substance types in ChEMBL

properties.label: Drug indication (MeSH)
properties.description: Drug indications in MeSH categories

properties.label: Drug development phase
properties.description: Drug development phase in ChEMBL

properties.label: PubChem ATC classification
properties.description: Anatomical Therapeutic Chemical (ATC) Classification in PubChem

properties.label: ChEMBL ATC classification
properties.description: Anatomical Therapeutic Chemical (ATC) Classification in ChEMBL

properties.label: Diseases in Mondo
properties.description: Disease or disorder categories in the Mondo Disease Ontology (Mondo)

properties.label: Diseases in MeSH
properties.description: Disease categories in Medical Subject Headings (MeSH)

properties.label: Diseases in NANDO
properties.description: Japanese intractable disease categories in the Nanbyo Disease Ontology (NANDO)

properties.label: Related DBs in Mondo
properties.description: The number of entries in disease related database in Mondo

properties.label: Phenotypic abnormality
properties.description: Phenotypic abnormality categories of the Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO)

properties.label: Consequence
properties.description: Variant consequence from TogoVar

properties.description: Variant clinical significance from TogoVar
